p: The considered literature data indicate that dsR-NAs are components of an evolutionarily formed system of nonspecific protection and play the role of functional linkers between innate and acquired immunity systems. Synthetic and natural dsRNA preparations are used in clinical practice as pharmaceutical substances for development of prophylactic antiviral and immunomodulatory agents, and there is a clear interest in expanding the sphere of their application and methods for improving therapeutic properties ( Table 1).
